*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $5.00). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only from May 6 - May 17, 2019 or while supplies last, whichever occurs first. Tims Kcup 72ct Product Code 61-09023 valued at $39.99 a carton. Excludes tax. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer is not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only with Ship To Locations in Vancouver, Calgary or Ontario. Cash value .001¢.
